meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>thin</kanji> <kanji>bacteria</kanji> is... well... a <vocabulary>bacteria</vocabulary>. I guess all bacteria are really thin. So thin you can't see them with your naked eye, in fact.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You've learned them already, so you should be able to read this on your own!
